name: code_visualization
description: Abstract visualizations of code concepts and programming themes
base_prompt: abstract digital art, code concept visualization, technology theme, circuit patterns, data flow, neon accents, dark background
negative_prompt: photo, realistic faces, cluttered, text heavy, low quality, blurry, messy
alt_text_instructions: Describe the programming or technology concept the visualization represents. Focus on the abstract meaning rather than literal description of shapes.
